page.title: 14The Shell Group of Hayle.
page.content: The{Shell Group}is a club for people who go to Sunday School at Hayle Methodist Church. We meet every Wednesday at 6.30pm. When you get there you pay 10p. We play football until everybody arrives. There are three leaders who organise the games. The most popular games are{Hockey and {Dodge Ball.}Hockey is a game that you play using a newspaper ball and two hollow tubes as sticks. Dodge Ball is exactly as it sounds you have to dodge the ball. Half way through the evening we have a cup of squash and a biscuit. Then we gather around the piano and sing songs. The Shell Group gives {concerts}in different parts of the county. Our meetings break up at 7.45pm and the Shell Group for elevens and over finishes at 9.00pm.
